titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Alumni Activities Photographs
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:12

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The photographs document alumni dinners, awards ceremonies, and various regional club activities.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 8-D (YRG 8-D), Audio-visual materials documenting Yale alumni activities.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Alumni Activities Photographs (RU 754). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The photographs are arranged by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The photographs document alumni dinners, awards ceremonies, and various regional club activities.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Alumni and alumnae
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University -- Alumnae and alumnae -- Societies, etc.

did.unittitle: Board and Corporation meetings and lunches
Greenwich, Hartford, New Britain, New Haven
Bachelor dinner for Holland S. Duell
St. Anthony's Club of New York City dinner
Association of Southern Yale Clubs at Mount Vernon, VA, and Washington, DC
Yale Club of Boston with President Taft
Associated Western Yale Clubs: 12th Annual Meeting, Kansas City, MO; 16th Annual Meeting, Pittsburgh, PA
